page.title: 12THE CHURCH
page.content: The small church of{St Peter}in the parish of{Buckland Tout Saints}was built sometime in the 14th C,partly rebuilt in 1799 and restored in the 1870's. The tower is 15th C. there are carvings inside believed to be 16th C. Services are held on Sundays.For July 1985 the diary reads 7th....Matins 14th...Holy Communion 21st...Matins 28th...Evensong (3.00 pm) There is A Communion Service held on the 1st and 3rd Thursday in each month. Taken by the Reverend P.Hancock. The running cost of the church this year are estimated at Â£2,302. This includes money set aside for the { Roof Restoration}fund which stands at just under Â£2000.
